title: PSVR 2 Comes to PC: $60 extra, Lacks Features - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.03.24
description:
Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!

Greg and Blessing chat PlayStation VR2 coming to PC, Naughty Dog doesn’t wanna be The Last of Us studio forever, & don’t expect Kingdom Hearts 4 news at SGF.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:57 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST is our Summer Game Fest predictions
     - The STREAM after that is Elden Ring w/ Andy & Nick
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway.
     - You can watch our reaction to the new VENOM trailer live! (and later for everyone on Youtube)
     - And you can get the Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
            -   The Roper Report   -
00:11:38 - PSVR 2 is coming to PC
